It is the first private hospital in Nigeria to achieve ISO 9001:2000 quality management system certification from the Standards Organization of Nigeria (SON) and was also recently accredited with COHSASA (Council for Health Service Accreditation of Southern Africa) Certificate.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative / HIM

Job Location: Woji, Port Harcourt - Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Position Overview

	We are seeking a dedicated and enthusiastic Customer Service Representative to join our dynamic team.
	The ideal candidate will be passionate about assisting customers, resolving inquiries, and providing outstanding service in a friendly environment.


Responsibilities


	Respond promptly and professionally to customer inquiries via phone, email, and chat.
	Identify and assess customers' needs to achieve satisfaction.
	Provide accurate information regarding products/services and company policies.
	Handle and resolve customer complaints in a calm and empathetic manner.
	Maintain a positive, empathetic, and professional attitude toward customers.
	Collaborate with other team members to ensure a seamless customer experience.


Requirements


	Must Have a Minimum of an OND in Health Information Management
	1 - 3 years proven experience in health information management and customer service in a healthcare setting.
	Strong communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
	Knowledge of medical terminology and patient privacy laws.
	Ability to multitask, prioritize, and work efficiently in a fast-paced environment.
	Must reside in Port Harcourt or its environs.





Benefits


	Competitive salary based on experience.
	Health insurance and other benefits package.
	Opportunities for career growth and professional development.
	A supportive and collaborative work environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume detailing their relevant experience to: recruitment@lilyhospitals.net using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

  "title": "Account Strategist",
  "description": "At Slvr Wlf Digitale, we believe that success in the business requires more than just the right ingredients; it&rsquo;s about blending them with passion, precision, and a dash of creativity to serve up unforgettable results that create timeless connections. We know that it&rsquo;s the heart and soul you put into the dish that keeps customers coming back for more. That&rsquo;s why we don&rsquo;t just serve our clients solutions&mdash;we create experiences. Every strategy, every piece of content, is carefully plated to reflect the unique flavour of your brand, ensuring that your message resonates deeply, connecting you with the right audience.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Strategist

Job Locations:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	As an Account Strategist, your job is to turn business objectives into actionable marketing strategies.
	You&rsquo;ll oversee campaigns, guide creative direction, and ensure that every post, ad, or email connects to measurable business outcomes.
	If you&rsquo;re the kind of person who asks &ldquo;Why?&rdquo; before &ldquo;How?&rdquo;, you&rsquo;ll fit right in.


Responsibilities
What You&rsquo;ll Do:


	Lead visibility campaigns from strategy to reporting.
	Translate client goals into content and advertising systems that work.
	Collaborate with the Content and Audiovisual teams to ensure alignment and quality.
	Track performance metrics (CPC, CTR, ROAS, engagement) and recommend optimisations.
	Translate client goals into clear strategies.
	Lead onboarding, brief creative teams, monitor performance, and ensure deliverables meet visibility and ROI targets


Requirements
What We&rsquo;re Looking For:


	2 &ndash; 4 years of experience in marketing, digital strategy, or brand communications.
	Strong understanding of Meta Ads or Google Ads platforms.
	Excellent communication and project coordination skills.
	A systems thinker who can connect creative ideas to business impact.


Non-negotiables:


	Strategic thinker with strong communication skills.
	Understands analytics, client management, and timelines.
	Calm under pressure, decisive, and professional.


Benefits


	Salary: N200,000 &ndash; N250,000 / month.
	Growth track &rarr; Head of Client Success or Growth Partner.


Why Work With Us


	At Slvr Wlf, balance meets growth. We&rsquo;re human-led, AI-enhanced, and strategy-driven.
	If you&rsquo;re ready to grow in a culture that values clarity, creativity, and accountability &mdash; welcome home.

        At Slvr Wlf Digitale, we believe that success in the business requires more than just the right ingredients; it’s about blending them with passion, precision, and a dash of creativity to serve up unforgettable results that create timeless connections. We know that it’s the heart and soul you put into the dish that keeps customers coming back for more. That’s why we don’t just serve our clients solutions—we create experiences. Every strategy, every piece of content, is carefully plated to reflect the unique flavour of your brand, ensuring that your message resonates deeply, connecting you with the right audience.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Strategist

Job Locations: Ibadan, Oyo

Job Description


	As an Account Strategist, your job is to turn business objectives into actionable marketing strategies.

	If you’re the kind of person who asks “Why?” before “How?”, you’ll fit right in.

	Lead visibility campaigns from strategy to reporting.

	Translate client goals into clear strategies.

	2 – 4 years of experience in marketing, digital strategy, or brand communications.

Why Work With Us


	At Slvr Wlf, balance meets growth. We’re human-led, AI-enhanced, and strategy-driven.
	If you’re ready to grow in a culture that values clarity, creativity, and accountability — welcome home.
